"Shadows of Deception" is a riveting crime thriller that revolves around the life of Sam, a brilliant yet troubled private investigator who specializes in unraveling elaborate cases of identity theft. After his identity is stolen and used in a high-profile embezzlement scheme, Sam finds himself wrongfully implicated and on the run.
